transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha mene wo bhi jo buylead dikh rahi hai na wo abhi ek bhi mere mere kaam ki use nahi hai abhi. Kyunki wo subah driving cylinder the usme 1 liter likha hai usme 1 liter mere paas available nahi rehta. 3 liter, 6 liter, 9 liter deta hai mere paas.
Executive: Thik hai to mai us time pe jab aapko. Cylinder, PVC gear gun wo sona tha cylinder PVC gear gun cylinder ki deal karta hu abhi mai.
Executive: Accha thik hai to wo hum change kara lenge jab abhi video edit pe aayenge to.
Customer: Ha ha PVC gear gun 3 liter, 6 liter, 9 liter ki dekho wo mai buylead wo consume karta hu sab.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai wo mai change kara dungi aapko. Carbon steel mein wo steel mein wo.
Customer: Ha abhi connect karte waqt dekh lete hai madam.
Executive: Abhi?
Customer: Nahi 3 baje, 3 baje.
Executive: 3 baje. Ha thik hai mai 3 baje aapko call karti hu, thik hai?
Customer: Ha okay okay thank you madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are not relevant to the customer's needs.

- Customer needs buyleads for 3, 6, and 9-liter PVC gear guns.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to change the product listing.

- Executive will call the customer at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product listing, pvc gear gun
